miniapp.name: Mintara Base
miniapp.subtitle: Create tokens & NFTs on Base
miniapp.description: A no-code platform for creating ERC20 tokens and AI-generated NFTs on the Base Network. Build, mint, and manage your Web3 assets without writing code.
miniapp.tagline: Build on Base, no code needed
miniapp.ogDescription: Create tokens and AI-generated NFTs on Base Network without code
